body:
The purpose of this Issue is to collect together previous issues that relate to virtual dependencies, with brief annotations as to the nature of the relationship.

#4595 (open)
> Limitations introduced:
> build-only dependencies cannot have virtual dependencies
Many packages have `python` as a build dependency.  This fact, combined with Python as a virtual dep (#7966), combined with #4595, could break a lot of Python things.  Even now, the concretizer is not able to handle DAGs where `python@2` is a build dependency and `python@3` is part of the DAG somewhere else.  #2548 (of which #4595 is a sequal) would fix that, apparently.
